request.description: This POST request to the /routes endpoint is used to create a new route for freight transportation. The request body expects a JSON object containing the startPoint and endPoint coordinates (latitude and longitude), departureDate and completionDate timestamps, requiredCarrierType specifying the type of carrier needed (e.g., BOX), and pricing details including price and currency. This endpoint helps in scheduling and pricing freight routes between specified locations within given time frames.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

response.name: The departure date can not be greater than completionDate or carrier is not available
